body_html: @keveman, please have a look at issue #3213 and at the comment there. This function is not for unloading libraries; it’s for freeing memory. Freeing memory is the caller’s responsibility, but the caller doesn’t know how it was allocated and, hence, cannot do it adequately. For unloading libraries, one might add something like TF_UnloadLibrary in the future.

body: @keveman, please have a look at issue #3213 and at the comment there. This function is not for unloading libraries; it’s for freeing memory. Freeing memory is the caller’s responsibility, but the caller doesn’t know how it was allocated and, hence, cannot do it adequately. For unloading libraries, one might add something like `TF_UnloadLibrary` in the future.
